tool.name: AcpypeParamsAc
tool.description: : This class is a wrapper of Acpype tool for small molecule parameterization for AMBER MD package.

param.name: input_path
param.label: input PDB,MDL,MOL2 file
param.help: Path to the input file. Format: [input].[format]

param.name: outname_output_path_frcmod
param.label: output FRCMOD name
param.help: Path to the FRCMOD output file Format: [output].frcmod

param.name: outname_output_path_inpcrd
param.label: output INPCRD name
param.help: Path to the INPCRD output file Format: [output].inpcrd

param.name: outname_output_path_lib
param.label: output LIB name
param.help: Path to the LIB output file Format: [output].lib

param.name: outname_output_path_prmtop
param.label: output PRMTOP name
param.help: Path to the PRMTOP output file Format: [output].prmtop

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: basename
param.label: basename
param.help: A basename for the project (folder and output files).

param.name: charge
param.label: charge
param.help: Net molecular charge, for gas default is 0. If None the charge is guessed by acpype.

param.name: acpype_path
param.label: acpype_path
param.help: Path to the acpype executable binary.
